name: Tentris Classic Block Down
description:
Tentris Classic Block Down is a old style puzzle game - in which your aim will be to don't let the block building to go up you can break it with a suitable block placing
Features:
* Nice graphics design
* Smooth and delicate animation
* Supports swipe and touch game controls
* Easy to learn and fun to master gameplay
* Enjoy game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
